#include <stdio.h>
#define numbre number
#define num number
int main()
{
    int number = 0, remainder = 0;
    {
        scanf("%d",&number);
        {
            remainder = numbre % 2;
        }
        if(remainder!=1)
        printf("%d is an even number.\n", num);
        else
        printf("%d is an odd number.\n", number);
    }
return 0;
}
